ruleset.name: Ian's PMD rules
ruleset.description: This is a set of demonstration rules to accompany "Checking Java Programs".

rule.name: DontThrowSQLException
rule.message: SQL Exceptions should be wrapped in DataBaseException
rule.description: SQL Exceptions are checked Exceptions and force needless try/catch or throws overhead on client code; these should be wrapped in DataBaseException or a similar unchecked Exception (RuntimeException subclass).
